Translations.Text: niyata vasayenma biya bætimatun hevana ha ulpat atara veti
tavada ovun asa karana palaturu atara da (veti)
numbala sidu karamin siti dæ hetuven numbala sæpase anubhava karanu. tavada panaya karanu (yæyi kiyanu læbe)
niyata vasayenma melesaya api dæhæmiyanta pratiphala pirinamanuye
numbala anubhava karanu. tavada mada kalak bhukti vindinu. niyata vasayenma numbala aparadhakaruvanya
(melovehi) ovunata (danin allamin nævi) rukuu karannæyi pavasanu labana vita ovuhu rukuu nokarati
min pasu va ovun visvasa karanuye kavara prakasayak da
